amendment.description: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce funding for the Environmental Protection Agency's Environmental Programs and Management account by $17 million and increase funding by $10 million for the agency's inspector general.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
